answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!An endocrinologist is a specialized doctor who looks after the endocrine glands in the body like thyroid, pancreas, adrenals etc. These glands secrete hormones that look after and control various body functions. Hence an endocrinologist treats thyroid disorders, diabetes mellitus, diabetes insipidus, Cushing's disease/syndrome etc. Hope this helps. Take care!
